title: rustc panic: libsyntax/lib.rs: index out of bounds: the len is 61 but the index is 247

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
```
$ RUST_BACKTRACE=1 cargo test
   Compiling regex v0.1.10
   Compiling regex_macros v0.1.5
   Compiling plotter v0.0.1 (file:///Users/andrew/git/libplotter-rust)
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: http://doc.rust-lang.org/complement-bugreport.html
note: run with `RUST_BACKTRACE=1` for a backtrace

```

Versions:

```
$ rustc --version
rustc 1.0.0-nightly (44a287e6e 2015-01-08 17:03:40 -0800)
$ cargo --version
cargo 0.0.1-pre-nightly (8c01b6b 2015-01-08 20:52:43 +0000)
```

Minimal code (error is `index out of bounds: the len is 61 but the index is 66`):

```
#[plugin]
extern crate regex_macros;
extern crate regex;

static R : regex::Regex = regex!(r".+");

fn main() {
    println!("Hello, world!");
}
```

Cargo.toml:

```
[dependencies]
regex = "0.1.10"
regex_macros = "0.1.5"
log = "0.1.9"
```
